lst.name: sentence
lst.str: It said the Bilzerian proposal calls for shareholders to receive on a blended basis 16.67 dlrs in cash and 3.30 dlrs in liquidation value of cumulative exchangeable redeemable preferred stock for each common share.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The second party anticipates executing a letter of intent when it delivers its financing commitment to the Pay N' Pak board that would incorporate an expense reinbursement and option arrangement, the company said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The company said it is evaluating the proposals from Paul Bilzerian and from a third party which is active in the leveraged buyout field but which Pay N' Pak declined to identify.

lst.name: sentence
